evalica - (12:48): vmassol: I'm working for a homepage for xwiki.org - I'll let you know when it's ready ... max 1h

vmassol - (12:51): we also need a jsx to change the link to the search  
vmassol - (12:51): serch page

vmassol - (12:52): lunch time, bb in 30mn

vmassol - (13:23): there's a pb on xwiki.org  
vmassol - (13:23): I need to relogin at each request  
tmortagne - (13:24): samr for me  
tmortagne - (13:24): \*same  
tmortagne - (13:28): ha no wait  
tmortagne - (13:28): actually no i don't have the same issue  
tmortagne - (13:28): i actually clicked on a link to another  wiki  
tmortagne - (13:28): when when i stay on the same wiki i don't loose auth  
jvelociter - (13:28): tmortagne: same for me  
jvelociter - (13:28): I lose auth between wikis  
tmortagne - (13:29): but I agree that we should not loose auth between wikis  
jvelociter - (13:29): yes  
tmortagne - (13:29): do we have the same somain configuration in xwiki.cg ?  
jvelociter - (13:29): we use not to  
tmortagne - (13:29): s/somain/domain/  
jvelociter - (13:29): I've merged the conf so normally it should be the same  
jvelociter - (13:29): but let me check  
tmortagne - (13:30): normally it's based on that I i remember well  
jvelociter - (13:30): ah  
jvelociter - (13:30): I made a mistake merging the conf it seems  
jvelociter - (13:31): there are all standard params  
jvelociter - (13:31): let me fix that  
jvelociter - (13:31): (vmassol )  
vmassol - (13:31): jvelociter: ok  
vmassol - (13:31): I cleared all my xwiki.org cookies and I still have the same pb  
vmassol - (13:31): (I'm logged out after each request)  
vmassol - (13:32): (on the same wiki)  
tmortagne - (13:32): vmassol: your case is different then indeed  
vmassol - (13:32): I'm on chrome  
vmassol - (13:32): I'll try FF  
tmortagne - (13:32): did you tried with other browsers ?  
tmortagne - (13:32): ok  
vmassol - (13:32): jvelociter: you're restarting?  
tmortagne - (13:32): i'm trying with chrome  
vmassol - (13:33): yes works better with FF  
vmassol - (13:33): so we have a chrome incompatibility (or a chrome bug)  
tmortagne - (13:33): vmassol: i have the same issue  
vmassol - (13:33): it used to work fine with the older version of XE though  
tmortagne - (13:33): with chrome  
vmassol - (13:34): ok  
jvelociter - (13:34): restarting  
vmassol - (13:34): k  
tmortagne - (13:34): it's like cookie was not working

sdumitriu - (14:13): No restarts on myxwiki so far  
vmassol - (14:13): nice :)  
sdumitriu - (14:14): And it seems to be still fast  
jvelociter - (14:15): sdumitriu: since when ?  
sdumitriu - (14:15): Since Ludo cleaned the spammed documents and I cleaned the events database  
vmassol - (14:16): jvelociter: cool cookies are working fine now  
vmassol - (14:16): both on FF and chrome  
vmassol - (14:16): :)  
vmassol - (14:16): jvelociter: the AS is empty though not sure why  
jvelociter - (14:16): great  
jvelociter - (14:17): which AS ?  
jvelociter - (14:17): the main wiki ?  
vmassol - (14:17): on dashboard for ex  
vmassol - (14:17): yes  
vmassol - (14:17): main wiki  
evalica - (14:17): vmassol: http://img29.imageshack.us/i/webhome.png/  
vmassol - (14:17): pb with tagcloud macro too

jvelociter - (14:17): there are 334331 events in DB

jvelociter - (14:18): evalica: nice  
vmassol - (14:18): evalica: we can refine later if need be  
jvelociter - (14:19): should we continue to advertise xeclipse and watch on the home page ?  
jvelociter - (14:19): I'm not sure  
evalica - (14:19): jvelociter: we have lots of pages with them  
vmassol - (14:19): jvelociter: yes indeed we shouldn't probably  
evalica - (14:19): that's why I added them ...  
evalica - (14:19): and they are found also in the quick links  
vmassol - (14:19): indeed  
jvelociter - (14:19): yes but they are dead/dormant projects  
evalica - (14:19): and Florin works on office  
jvelociter - (14:20): I did not say xoffice  
evalica - (14:20): and this is org .. not com  
vmassol - (14:20): so we could mention on their home page that they are not active  
evalica - (14:20): aaa watch  
vmassol - (14:20): clearly  
evalica - (14:20): anyway .. keep them :P  
evalica - (14:20): they look nice 6 :P  
jvelociter - (14:20): vmassol: then remove them from the block too  
jvelociter - (14:20): 4 would work  
vmassol - (14:20): jvelociter: I'm fine in the blocks  
vmassol - (14:20): it's normal that they are there  
jvelociter - (14:20): well I don't find it coherent  
vmassol - (14:20): at least till we completely remove them  
vmassol - (14:20): they're not removed  
vmassol - (14:20): they're still top level projects  
jvelociter - (14:21): you advertise on  the home page but then say they are not active  
vmassol - (14:21): and it's good people sees them  
vmassol - (14:21): they may want to contribute to them  
jvelociter - (14:21): well then let's put back workspaces;)  
vmassol - (14:21): what's important is that their status is very clear  
vmassol - (14:21): no we've remove worskpaces  
vmassol - (14:21): it's no longer in svn nor in jira  
jvelociter - (14:21): (ok, it's not a TLP anomore)  
jvelociter - (14:21): yes  
jvelociter - (14:21): I know  
jvelociter - (14:22): vmassol: then we can tag them as inactive on the home page  
jvelociter - (14:22): just an idea  
vmassol - (14:22): yes I'm fine with that too  
vmassol - (14:22): but at least they need to be tagged as "inactive" on their home page  
evalica - (14:22): can someone give me edit rights?  
vmassol - (14:22): since people can arrive directly on their home  
vmassol - (14:22): evalica: doing it now  
evalica - (14:22): thanks  
sdumitriu - (14:23): Is someone upgrading myxwiki already?  
evalica - (14:23): jv I think

vmassol - (14:23): ;)  
jvelociter - (14:23): vmassol: yes I've seen that  
jvelociter - (14:23): what's strange is that it does not appear on other wikis  
jvelociter - (14:23): mmh  
jvdrean - (14:23): evalica: no not upgraded  
jvelociter - (14:23): maybe I know  
sdumitriu - (14:24): jvdrean: I'll do it  
jvdrean - (14:24): XWikiPreferences must be converted to xwiki/2.0  
jvdrean - (14:24): (jvelociter)  
jvelociter - (14:24): ah  
vmassol - (14:24): ok converting it  
jvelociter - (14:25): ok  
sdumitriu - (14:25): 2.6-SNAPSHOT.${buildNumber} -> You should fix this  
jvdrean - (14:25): the page must not be converted automatically  
jvdrean - (14:26): because in this case all the textarea props are converted  
jvdrean - (14:26): and some html/velocity that is included in the templates are surrounded with {{html}}  
jvdrean - (14:26): (which is a problem when included from the templates)  
vmassol - (14:27): done woroks better thanks jvdrean

evalica - (14:44): vmassol: why ?skin=colibri doesn't work?  
vmassol - (14:44): works for me  
vmassol - (14:45): http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/?skin=colibri  
evalica - (14:45): for me it doesn't in FF - but maybe it because I played with some extension - I'll look into it  
sdumitriu - (14:46): Neither for me  
vmassol - (14:46): Im' on chrome though  
sdumitriu - (14:46): I mean it works as in "it's not Toucan anymore", but there's no style at all  
tmortagne - (14:46): same here, http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/?skin=colibri is really not nice for me  
vmassol - (14:46): doesn't work in FF here too  
vmassol - (14:46): but works nice in chrome  
tmortagne - (14:46): FF too  
evalica - (14:46): maybe the skin needs to be set somewhere  
sdumitriu - (14:47): @import "/xwiki/bin/skin/skins/albatross/colibri.css";  
tmortagne left at 14:48 (Quit: tmortagne  
evalica - (14:48): sdumitriu: can you fix it?  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 14:48  
sdumitriu - (14:50): evalica: Not really  
sdumitriu - (14:50): Aha  
sdumitriu - (14:50): I think I know what's wrong  
sdumitriu - (14:50): mflorea: This is caused by your change  
evalica - (14:50): I think florea put in style.css  
evalica - (14:50): the relative path  
sdumitriu - (14:51): getSkinFile doesn't see the ?skin=colibri parameter  
vmassol - (14:51): jvelociter: I think you need to put indexes for AS  
vmassol - (14:51): it's really slow  
mflorea - (14:51): sdumitriu: what do you mean?  
sdumitriu - (14:52): jvelociter: While at it, add an index on (ase\_page, ase\_date), since it's used in a query  
sdumitriu - (14:52): mflorea: bin/view/Some/Document?skin=colibri  
jvelociter - (14:52): we need to do that on all DBs, I gues ?  
sdumitriu - (14:52): This asks for style.css from the colibri skin  
sdumitriu - (14:52): jvelociter: Yes  
sdumitriu - (14:52): jvelociter: No  
sdumitriu - (14:52): jvelociter: Only the main database stores events  
jvelociter - (14:52): now you puzzled me  
jvelociter - (14:52): ah OK  
jvelociter - (14:53): didn't know that  
sdumitriu - (14:53): All the other databases are empty  
jvelociter - (14:53): ok  
jvelociter - (14:53): creatnig them thus  
jvelociter - (14:53): sdumitriu: can you update the conf with the new indeX?  
sdumitriu - (14:53): mflorea: /bin/skin/skins/colibri/style.css requests colibri.css from the current skin, but the current skin is not found to be colibri anymore, since it's not passed in the URL  
sdumitriu - (14:53): jvelociter: What conf?  
jvelociter - (14:54): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Database%20Administration  
jvelociter - (14:54): I mean  
sdumitriu - (14:54): jvelociter: Sure  
evalica - (14:55): sdumitriu: but if we set the main skin to have the base skin colibri, is gonna be ok right? but toucan will be broken then  
jvelociter - (14:55): thanks  
evalica - (14:55): and we want to make this change, right?  
sdumitriu - (14:55): evalica: Yes  
evalica - (14:55): k  
vmassol - (14:56): jvelociter: I don't know this macro: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/RemoteCodeMacro Is it on code.xwiki.org? (I don't see it)  
mflorea - (14:56): sdumitriu: why is $xwiki.getSkinFile('colibri.css', true) returning /xwiki/bin/skin/skins/albatross/colibri.css ?  
sdumitriu - (14:56): mflorea: I guess this could be fixed if the XWiki#getSkin method also looked in the path  
jvelociter - (14:57): vmassol: mmh yes it's from me, but I don't remember where I use it TBH  
vmassol - (14:57): (jvelociter: it has no visibility defined - remove it if you don't use it)  
vmassol - (14:57): (it sounds nice though, maybe should be put on code.xwiki.org if it works ;))  
jvelociter - (14:57): I think it's used vmassol  
vmassol - (14:57): jvelociter: see http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/WikiMacros  
jvelociter - (14:57): maybe on front-end resource page  
sdumitriu - (14:57): mflorea: Because colibri is not found by the getSkin algorithm, which looks in URL skin= parameter, cookie, and wiki configuration  
vmassol - (14:57): (problem of desceriprtion + no visibliity)  
sdumitriu - (14:58): mflorea: And neither by getSkinFile, which looks in getSkin, baseskin, and defaultbaseskin  
mflorea - (15:01): sdumitriu: so what's the problem? Why do we access bin/skin/skins/colibri/style.css if the current skin is not colibri?  
evalica - (15:01): to test how it look on colibri - using the param ?skin=colibri  
sdumitriu - (15:01): mflorea: Because it was requested in the URL  
sdumitriu - (15:02): bin/view/Main/WebHome?skin=colibri  
jvelociter - (15:02): vmassol: now it's used  
jvelociter - (15:02): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/ConfirmationBox  
sdumitriu - (15:02): This is a classic way of previewing a skin  
jvelociter - (15:02): it's a useful macro I think  
jvelociter - (15:02): we should keep it  
vmassol - (15:02): ok  
tmortagne - (15:02): what i find weir is that AFAIK skin=colibri is supposed to change the current skin  
vmassol - (15:02): I'm just saying the same thing jvelociter  
vmassol - (15:02): ie we should publihs it on code.xwiki.org  
jvelociter - (15:02): yes we could publish it too  
jvelociter - (15:03): I don't know why I did not  
jvelociter - (15:03): maybe because it's too painful :D  
mflorea - (15:03): sdumitriu: ok, understood. And there's no way to pass the skin URL parameter to the getSkinFile?  
jvelociter - (15:03): doing it now  
vmassol - (15:04): jvelociter: let us know when you've set the indexe  
vmassol - (15:04): indexes  
vmassol - (15:04): I cannot display the Dadhboard page right now  
vmassol - (15:04): taking too long  
jvelociter - (15:04): indexes are set  
vmassol - (15:04): xwiki.org is real slow  
evalica - (15:05): I know ...  
vmassol - (15:05): brb  
evalica - (15:05): I can upload the color theme on the import .... still tring  
jvelociter - (15:06): there are some stuck queries  
jvelociter - (15:06): let me kill them  
sdumitriu - (15:06): mflorea: No, no way  
sdumitriu - (15:06): mflorea: Unless we change getSkinFile to pass along URL parameters  
sdumitriu - (15:06): Which would be actually very nice since it would allow previewing color themes as well  
sdumitriu - (15:07): But there's no quick fix to use right now, without changing Java code  
sdumitriu - (15:09): mflorea: +  overflow: visible;  -> don't you need to also change this for hx span?  
mflorea - (15:10): sdumitriu: hx span doesn't have it colibri, and I don't thin it causes issues when on span  
sdumitriu - (15:10): mflorea: Are you sure it's not in colibri? I saw it yesterday  
evalica - (15:11): mflorea: sdumitriu now the ?skin=colibri works  
evalica - (15:11): if the base skin is colibri - so it wasn't tested if base skin is toucan  
mflorea - (15:11): sdumitriu: I just checked on colibri.css trunk  
mflorea - (15:12): sdumitriu: what about storing the skin name in the cookie when skin=skinName is use in the URL, like it happens with the language. It will affect only you (not the rest of the users) and you can always revert to the previous skin. WDYT?  
evalica - (15:15): sdumitriu: can you please help me with the header ? http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/XWikiOrgSkin?editor=object  
evalica - (15:15): I don't want to break something  
evalica - (15:16): the logo is off and we have the old toucan user | logout displayed  
evalica - (15:17): the new logos are attached to the color themes - so they should work by default on colibri ... do we still need to old way for xwiki.org when the logos were attached to the ssx?  
jvelociter - (15:18): I have no skin on code.xwiki.org  
evalica - (15:19): i think the skin needs to be set for each wiki?  
jvelociter - (15:20): probably  
jvelociter - (15:20): (I don't know what you are doing really)  
evalica - (15:20): actually no - xwiki:XWiki.XWikiOrgSkin has aas skin  
jvelociter - (15:20): but right now code.xiwki.org  
jvelociter - (15:20): is naged  
jvelociter - (15:21): naked  
vmassol - (15:21): jvdrean: do you know what to do to get the AS to display on the user profile (for ex: http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/VincentMassol )  
vmassol - (15:21): evalica: indeed subwikis were referencing the main wiki's skin AFAIR

evalica - (15:22): the skin  
evalica - (15:22): path

evalica - (15:22): I can do that  
evalica - (15:22): k

vmassol - (15:23): for the panel bullet lists for ex
